citations.narrative:
Four outdoor enclosures housing a total of 8 adult dogs had shelters that did not have wind/rain breaks at the entrance.
Wind/rain breaks are necessary to protect the dogs from wind and to prevent the dogs from getting wet while in their
shelters. The licensee must ensure that all shelters have a wind/rain break at the entrance at all times.
To be corrected by: 1 December 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.4(b)(3) 
   
Outdoor housing facilities. 
Four outdoor enclosures housing a total of 8 adult dogs had shelters that did not have wind/rain breaks at the entrance. 
Wind/rain breaks are necessary to protect the dogs from wind and to prevent the dogs from getting wet while in their 
shelters. The licensee must ensure that all shelters have a wind/rain break at the entrance at all times. 
 
To be corrected by: 1 December 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
